{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = ASUS USB-N53.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Dual-Band Wireless-N600 USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Adapters/USBN53/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = ASUS |model = USB-N53 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = August 29, 2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_USB-N53 |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 0b05 |device_id = 179d |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = MSQ-USBN53 |icid = 3568A-USBN53 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = F4:6D:04 |chip1 = Ralink;RT3572; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Askey |manuf_model = WLU5090 |manuf_rev = -D61 |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/19/2011 |estreldate = 10/01/2011 |price = |upc = 610839393589 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = N82E16833320089 |asin = B005SAKW9G |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== {{WiFiCert|WFA12425|07/27/2011}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://linux-hardware-guide.com/2013-10-31-asus-usb-n53-802-11n-usb-wifi-adapter-dual-band-2-4ghz-300mbps5ghz-300mbps Linux Hardware Guide] ==Notes== ===lsusb=== 
Bus 001 Device 006: ID 0b05:179d ASUSTek Computer, Inc. 
    USB-N53 802.11abgn Network Adapter [Ralink RT3572]

Chipset detected - rt: 3572, rf: 0009, rev: 0223.
'''works good with Linux Kernel 3.1.1''' 
 Device Drivers
 - > Network device support
 - - > Ralink driver support
 - - - > Ralink rt27xx/rt28xx/rt30xx (USB) support (RT2800USB)
 - - - - > "rt2800usb - Include support for unknown (USB) devices 
            (RT2800USB_UNKNOWN)" have to be activated
===dmesg=== 
usb 5-6: new high-speed USB device number 13 using ehci_hcd
usb 5-6: New USB device found, idVendor=0b05, idProduct=179d
usb 5-6: New USB device strings: Mfr=1, Product=2, SerialNumber=3
usb 5-6: Product: 802.11 n WLAN
usb 5-6: Manufacturer: Ralink
usb 5-6: SerialNumber: 1.0
usb 5-6: reset high-speed USB device number 13 using ehci_hcd
ieee80211 phy6: Selected rate control algorithm 'minstrel_ht'
Registered led device: rt2800usb-phy6::radio
Registered led device: rt2800usb-phy6::assoc
Registered led device: rt2800usb-phy6::quality
